name: Flower of Life
description:
This is a visual novel designed made by myself.

The whole story and the scripts are original.  The implementation is based on Fungus framework of Unity. The codes are written by myself.

The aesthetic assets, sound effects and music are downloaded from Internet. For some of them, I made some simple modification like changing the color of the images and music clipping.

The background music are all from Hollow Knight Soundtrack. So put your head phone on playing it.

Game time 15-20 minutes.
